pullrequest.title: Fix for Issue #365: warn when messages are dropped

content.html:
This flag is set on a per-publisher basis. So, multiple different publishers could output the warning message. You could make queueLimitWarned a static variable inside this function, which will cause the warning message to be printed only once:

{
  static bool queueLimitWarned = false
  ...
  if (!queueLimitWarned)
    queueLimitWarned = true
  ...
}
